violations.comment: Service client types should have a Client suffix.
Service client types should have a Client suffix.

violations.suggestion: Use individual keyword-only arguments instead of an options dict.
violations.comment: Do not use an options bag object to group optional parameters.
Async clients should be in a separate namespace with .aio appended.

violations.suggestion: Use the same client name for sync and async packages, e.g., ContosoClient and ContosoAsyncClient.
violations.comment: Sync and async clients should have the same name.
